name: Anthropic PBC
observations: Anthropic PBC is an American artificial intelligence (AI) startup company founded in 2021.
Anthropic has developed a family of large language models (LLMs) named Claude as a competitor to OpenAI's ChatGPT and Google's Gemini.
The company researches and develops AI to study their safety properties at the technological frontier and use this research to deploy safe models for the public.

name: Daniela Amodei
observations: Daniela Amodei is a co-founder of Anthropic PBC.
Daniela Amodei is a former member of OpenAI.

name: Amazon

name: Google
observations: In October 2023, Google announced a $2 billion commitment to Anthropic PBC.
